trans-unit.source: A message passing library for gateways onto the public Internet.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于公共互联网网关的信息传递库。

trans-unit.source: There are some users, and some nodes (on a private LAN). Messidge brokers between the two. It authenticates, encrypts, and can validate the provenance of an rpc call.
trans-unit.target: 有一些用户,和一些节点(在一个私有局域网上)。Messidge在两者之间做中介。它可以验证、加密,并可以验证一个rpc调用的来源。
